visual_assets.name: COVID-19 virus

visual_assets.name: Spike protein key
visual_assets.purpose: symbolizes how the virus unlocks cells

visual_assets.name: Human cell with receptor
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon human cell, smooth blue membrane, with a small yellow 'lock' shaped receptor on its surface

visual_assets.name: Arrow icon
visual_assets.purpose: indicates direction of movement or entry
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon arrow pointing right, light grey, minimal design

visual_assets.name: Adenovirus vaccine vector
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon modified adenovirus, non-spiky, resembling a small green delivery truck, no text

visual_assets.name: Human cell
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon human cell, smooth blue membrane, no internal details

visual_assets.name: Genetic instruction scroll
visual_assets.purpose: symbolizes genetic code delivered by vaccine

visual_assets.name: Isolated Spike protein
